name: Ducks and GUNS
description:
Mother duck is searching for her children. in the way, she need to deal with enemies, when she find one of her children, he get a gun and start walking after her, and shoot like her.

Made in 1 week for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1 for the theme "Stronger Together"

fire_soldier888 - progamming.

G55cubing - Graphics.

Controls:

look around - mouse.

shoot - left click.

move - A,S or right and left arrow keys

jump - Space, W or up arrow key.
